\setlength{\parindent}{0pt}

\begin{document}

    
    
\subsection*{Contents}

\begin{itemize}
\setlength{\itemsep}{-1ex}
   \item CVODES OPTIONS
   \item STATES
   \item PARAMETERS ( for these sensitivities will be computed )
   \item CONSTANTS ( for these no sensitivities will be computed )
   \item SYSTEM EQUATIONS
   \item INITIAL CONDITIONS
   \item OBSERVALES
   \item SYSTEM STRUCT
\end{itemize}
\begin{verbatim}
function [model] = example_model_3_syms()
\end{verbatim}


\subsection*{CVODES OPTIONS}

\begin{verbatim}
% set the default absolute tolerance
model.atol = 1e-8;
% set the default relative tolerance
model.rtol = 1e-8;
% set the default maximum number of integration steps
model.maxsteps = 1e4;
% set the parametrisation of the problem options are 'log', 'log10' and
% 'lin' (default).
model.param = 'log10';
\end{verbatim}


\subsection*{STATES}

\begin{verbatim}
% create state syms
syms x1 x2 x3

% create state vector
x = [
x1 x2 x3
];
\end{verbatim}


\subsection*{PARAMETERS ( for these sensitivities will be computed )}

\begin{verbatim}
% create parameter syms
syms p1 p2 p3 p4 p5

% create parameter vector
p = [p1,p2,p3,p4,p5];
\end{verbatim}


\subsection*{CONSTANTS ( for these no sensitivities will be computed )}

\begin{par}
this part is optional and can be ommited
\end{par} \vspace{1em}
\begin{verbatim}
% create parameter syms
syms k1 k2 k3 k4

% create parameter vector
k = [k1 k2 k3 k4];
\end{verbatim}


\subsection*{SYSTEM EQUATIONS}

\begin{verbatim}
% create symbolic variable for time
syms t

xdot = sym(zeros(size(x)));

% piecewise defined function
xdot(1) = -2*p1*x1^2 - p2*x1*x2 + 2*p3*x2 + p4*x3 + p5;
% inhomogeneous
xdot(2) = +p1*x1^2 - p2*x1*x2 - p3*x2 + p4*x3;
xdot(3) = p2*x1*x2 - p4*x(3) - k4*x(3);
\end{verbatim}


\subsection*{INITIAL CONDITIONS}

\begin{verbatim}
x0 = sym(zeros(size(x)));

x0(1) = k1;
x0(2) = k2;
x0(3) = k3;
\end{verbatim}


\subsection*{OBSERVALES}

\begin{verbatim}
y = sym(zeros(1,1));

y = x;
\end{verbatim}


\subsection*{SYSTEM STRUCT}

\begin{verbatim}
model.sym.x = x;
model.sym.k = k;
model.sym.xdot = xdot;
model.sym.p = p;
model.sym.x0 = x0;
model.sym.y = y;
\end{verbatim}
\begin{verbatim}
end
\end{verbatim}

        \color{lightgray} \begin{verbatim}ans = 
        atol: 1e-08
        rtol: 1e-08
    maxsteps: 10000
       param: 'log10'
         sym: [1x1 struct]
\end{verbatim} \color{black}
